Publish Research using Quarto

2nd SARA Bootcamp

R
Data Science
Bootcamp
Quarto
A hands-on, immersive three-day offline bootcamp for researchers, academics, students, and data enthusiasts ‚Äî all levels welcome.
Published

February 28, 2026

20 Seats Only  ¬∑  Offline  ¬∑  3 Days

Register Now


The 2nd SARA Bootcamp brings together researchers, students, and academics for three days of intensive, practical learning on how to write, format, and publish research using Quarto and R - two of the most powerful open-source tools in modern research communication.

SARA believes research produced by and about marginalized communities must be heard. This bootcamp equips you with the tools to publish that research professionally, reproducibly, and beautifully.


Learn. Write. Publish.

üî¨ What is Quarto?

Quarto is a next-generation open-source scientific publishing system. Write in Markdown, embed R or Python code, and publish as PDF, HTML, Word, or a full website ‚Äî all from one document.

üë• Who Should Attend?

Researchers, PhD scholars, postgraduates, faculty, NGO professionals, journalists, and anyone who wants to write and publish evidence-based work. No prior coding experience needed for beginners‚Äô track.

üèÜ What You Take Home

A published or near-published research piece, a working Quarto + R setup, a certificate of participation from SARA, and a network of fellow researchers committed to inclusive knowledge production.

üìä Why R?

R is the gold standard for statistical computing and data visualisation in research. Used by academics, government statisticians, and data scientists worldwide ‚Äî and it‚Äôs free and open-source.


Proudly Supported by The Ambedkar Educational Society, Sonipat

We are grateful to the Ambedkar Educational Society, Sonipat for generously supporting the 2nd SARA Bootcamp. As part of their commitment to empowering marginalized communities through education, the Society is providing subsidized accommodation support for all participants during the five-day program.

This collaboration enables us to:

  • Keep the bootcamp completely free of tuition fees

  • Offer affordable and shared accommodation

  • Provide nutritious meals for all participants

The support from the Ambedkar Educational Society ensures that students from all socioeconomic backgrounds can attend the program without financial barriers and participate fully in the learning experience.


What You will Learn

‚öôÔ∏è Setting Up Your Research Environment

Install R, RStudio, and Quarto. Understand the workflow from data to document.

üìù Thesis Writing with Quarto Markdown

Structure research papers, reports, and dissertations using Quarto‚Äôs powerful markdown syntax.

üìö Citations & Bibliography

Manage references with Zotero and BibTeX. Auto-generate formatted citations in APA, MLA, or Chicago style.

üåê Publishing to PDF, HTML & Web

Render your research to multiple formats and publish it as a website, PDF report, or journal submission.

üîÅ Reproducible Research Practices

Learn version control with Git and GitHub to make your research transparent, reproducible, and collaborative.

üé® Interactive Slides

Quarto replaces PowerPoint, Beamer (LaTeX), and R Markdown slides all at once - with reproducibility, live code output, and web publishing built in.

Three Days, Full Schedule

Section under process.

Each day builds on the previous. By Day 3 you will have produced a complete, publishable research document.
